The IxDA Speaker Network is Live | IxDA

18 Dec 2012

The IxDA have just announced their new speaker network. I'm seeing the rise of things like this lately. That's a good thing IMHO if you know stuff you should make an effort to share it with other people.

The goal of the speaker network is to not only allow groups with more access to speakers to share opportunities with other groups, but to give everyone a chance to speak on what is passionate to them. Many may not consider themselves speakers, but have great stories to tell, and we want to hear them. A link to the speaker network is accessible via IxDA.org within both the local and about areas. The direct link to the form is http://tiny.cc/IxDASpeakers. I'd like to encourage everyone to add themselves to the database as well as spreading the word to those you know that have stories to share.
